name: Sunny the Bunny
description:
Sunny the Bunny is a indie project that is still under development, 
so a lot can change until the final phase.
A platform game with 2D Pixel Art graphics developed by one person, 
using free resources found on the internet.
Credits:
Developer, Producer, Game Design, Level Design:
- Ricardo Rolim de Oliveira
Graphics:
- Pixel Art: https://pixelgameart.org/web/
- Pixel Artist Ansimuz
Sounds:
-Eduardo Castro
-https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
-https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/
-https://freesound.org/
This demo is being made available for testing. 
I look forward to the feedbacks. Any and all comments about 
the project will be most welcome.
The download is free, but I thank you wholeheartedly 
if you can contribute by making a donation. 
Your contribution will help maintain the project 
to acquire new resources.
Thanks for playing.
